short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your SiteGround FileManager editing experience with easy fullscreen toggling!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"FullScreen Toggle for SiteGround FileManager" is an intuitive, user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enrich your file management experience on SiteGround. With just a simple click, you can now toggle between fullscreen and windowed modes in the SiteGround file editor, allowing you to maximize your workspace and focus on your coding or file editing.

Key Features:

Easy Toggling: A convenient button is added directly into the SiteGround FileManager UI, enabling you to switch to fullscreen mode effortlessly.
Enhanced Editing Experience: Enjoy an expanded workspace and increased focus, especially beneficial for coding or editing lengthy documents.
Seamless Compatibility: Designed to operate smoothly with the current SiteGround FileManager interface, the extension integrates perfectly without disrupting your workflow.
Simple Installation: No complicated setup required; install the extension and it's ready to use.
Lightweight and Fast: Minimal impact on your browser's performance, ensuring a smooth and responsive user experience.
Whether you're a developer, web designer, or someone who frequently manages files on SiteGround, this extension is crafted to simplify your interaction with the SiteGround file editor and enhance your productivity.

Install "FullScreen Toggle for SiteGround FileManager" now and transform the way you work with files on SiteGround!
